name: Stick it to 'em
description:
Crimes are pouring in, and it's your job to sort through the boxes of evidence,  arrange it on your crime board, and connect the dots to link the crimes to the prime suspects. 

Make sure your stay organised; because if you get too messy and can't solve a crime in time, you lose an evidence box - lose all three and your off the case! 

Gameplay video
